child.text: Gestione del flusso dei dati Previdenziali dai contribuenti verso l'azienda e viceversa, area Amministrativa
Traduzione di diversi progetti in lingua inglese, recente collaborazione con l'area marketing nella traduzione dello yearbook aziendale e del nuovo sito (online @ www.starching.it)

ABOUT.text:
Motivated and versatile professional with a diverse background in languages, cultural studies, and increasing passion in the web development field (mostly frontend, I really enjoy learning new languages🤓).
  Experienced in balancing work and study commitments, with a proactive approach to learning and personal development. 
 Currently expanding skill set in web development, especially in HTML & CSS, JavaScript & Vue.js, PHP & Laravel, SQL and initial exposure to digital transformation concepts. 

Seeking opportunities to leverage linguistic expertise and technical skills in a dynamic and stimulating environment❤️.

More info available in my personal cv, DM me if interested.

child.text:
I embarked on a transformative journey during my undergraduate studies at Ca' Foscari, renowned for its distinguished academic environment. 
Balancing my academic pursuits alongside professional commitments, I mastered the art of time management and multitasking.
Over three enriching years, I not only expanded my cultural horizons but also cultivated a diverse set of skills, both professionally and personally. 
 Beyond my academic curriculum, I explored diverse domains offered by the university,  including economics, communications, strategic studies, and information technology. 
This immersive experience broadened my perspectives, fostering growth and adaptability in a rapidly evolving landscape.
